metadata.title: CVE-2018-4059 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable unsafe default configuration vulnerability exists in theTURN server function of coTURN prior to version 4.5.0.9. By default, theTURN server runs an unauthenticated telnet admin portal on the loopbackinterface. This can provide administrator access to the TURN serverconfiguration, which can lead to additional attacks. An attacker who canget access to the telnet port can gain administrator access to the TURNserver.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4059` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

coturn - 4.5.1.1-1.1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: coturn package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.1.1-1.1build1').
